title: Introduction
description: Learn how to use and navigate the guide.

title: Installation
description: Learn how to include the C3 Web SDK in your app.

title: Clients
description: Learn what a client is and how to create one.

title: Authentication
description: Learn how to register and login users, and how to authenticate them.

title: Display name
description: Learn how to change the display name of a user.

title: Rooms
description: Learn how to create a room and invite users to it.

title: Messaging
description: Learn how to send messages to users within a room.

title: WebRTC
description: Learn how to setup a WebRTC video call between users within a room.
